      • reloadView

        public void reloadView(android.view.View view)

        public void reloadView(View view)

        Reloads the view of this item. This should be IStateView otherwise the selection mode will be not handled.

        Also invalidates the given view to handle current state of the background selector.

        Parameters:
        view -
